details.title: Bioinformatic analysis of putative gene products encoded in SARS-HCoV genome
details.abstract: The cause of severe acute respi ratory syndrome (SARS) has been identified as a new coronavir us named as SARS-HCoV. Using bioinformatic methods, we have performed a detailed domain search. In addition to the viral structure proteins, we have found that several putative polypeptides share sequence similarity to known domains or proteins. This study may provide a basis for future studies on the infection and replication process of this notorious virus.
